title: Harry Potter books get new animated life for Apple iBooks Store release
text:
Harry Potter books get new animated life for Apple iBooks Store release 
Published By: Pocket-lint.com - Today 
If you've not read Harry Potter or simply need an excuse to do it again, the new Apple iBooks Store release of the series could be perfect f...
